name: Dracula
overview: You are in Count Dracula's castle and you must try to finish him off. To do this you will have to find a stake, a hammer and a cross in the maze of rooms of his mansion, the only effective weapons to be able to successfully face your enemy. Remember that you have to find him before dark, otherwise you will die. You will also have to prevent ghosts, vampires and other castle guards from reaching you.
